patthana17.18:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naatītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.18:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naanāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.18:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo napaccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
